pic1_alt: A map of the United States, with multi-colored child handprints scattered across it. Below the map is the text National Database of Childcare Prices.
pic2_alt: A map of the United States, with counties colored in shades of blue by the price of infant center-based care. Indiana, New Mexico, Colorado, and most counties in Alaska, Hawaii, and Missouri do not have data available. The rest range from an unlabeled lower bound up to 24,400. Stand-out dark counties include the Bay area of California, Alaska, Hawaii, Massachusettes, and one county in Wyoming.
